Najah:::

Najah left slowly the place due his wounds  he opened his comm link 
in Alliance's frecuency and said "Don't forget the loyal Najah... 
Don't forget a loyal Alliance'sss member..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> About 20 shots nail Zardus and send him flipping out of the way of
> some jet, spinning around and firing back at Nightstrike. He looks 
at
> the jet and then activates his comm.
> 
> "Alliance members, lets get out of here," he says over his comm,
> flying away from the CF and carrying Nemesis with him.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Nightstrike:
> > 
> > Nightstrike shot 10 times against Zardus and followed his team.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > > Wildrider looks up, "I can't we got orders, keep him busy"
> Wildrider
> > > shouted, a bit depressed with the fact that he couldnt join his
